file_content.text: We've got him now. I know it.
As I was saying... with House Rist unable to protect him, I have no doubt that Duke Corwin is seeking asylum with the Organas.
The Rists didn't know where he went. How do you?
How can you be sure?
Makes sense, considering how buddy buddy they've been.
Seems likely.
The facts support that assumption as well.
Thul scouts reported spotting a civilian shuttle headed into Organa territory shortly after you breached House Rist's compound.
I've already crushed the best this planet has to offer.
They won't be able to stop me.
The Organas have offworld support as well, but let's not speculate.
You've more than demonstrated your talent for frontal assault.
There's nowhere left for my cousin to run. Go kick down House Organa's doors and give them hell. Expect a bonus for any additional Organa casualties.
I apologize for recalling you here, but I couldn't risk my cousin catching wind of this discussion.
If his retreat from House Rist is any indication, the Durasteel Duke is already running scared and I'd like him to stay right where he is.
Explain.
It may not be our goal, but crippling House Rist is worth noting. Consider this payment for supporting the Thul war effort.
You didn't call me back just to pay me.
I want to know why I'm here.
Your whole family is on the Rist's hit list.
Rist isn't out of the picture.
Hmm. Thank you for the warning, but I don't think Rist is in any position to strike after your actions.
Man after my own heart.
Better than nothing.
What is the meaning of this?
I just caught this little rake of yours in a dalliance with my wife!
More like you caught your wife in a dalliance with me, cuckold.
Unless you want half of House Thul questioning why we continue to keep you riffraff here, you'll grant me that winter haven of yours.
My grandfather's estate? Are you mad? That's half my family's lands! Advocate, kill this petty extortionist and I'll double what I just gave you.
They're your credits.
Double? Deal.
You picked a bad time to show up, buddy.
Sure, I'll take a freebie.
You'd pay this thug to murder me? It's idiotic to think you'd actually get away with that.
If there is anything "this thug" has taught me, it's to handle threats directly.
There is a war going on, or hadn't you noticed? You've just become another unfortunate casualty.
You're insa--
That was... liberating.
Worth every last credit. Thank you, advocate.
I'm not some common thug to be sent at everyone who annoys you.
Jobs take planning, contracts.
You can't even command authority over a hired goon? You're pathetic, Zacar! I'll expect that deed promptly.
I thought if there was anyone on this damnable planet I could finally rely on, it was you.
Raffid, you're confined to your chambers--indefinitely. Hope I do not keep you there the rest of your natural life. Now get out.
My life or yours, Father?
Advocate, are you there? Damn this blasted thing! Can you hear me? I have news.
I don't dare discuss the details on an insecure channel. Please return to House Girard as soon as possible.
Be exceptionally careful. House Rist is no place for recklessness.
My cousin is safe within the sanctuary of House Rist. If he's under their protection, it's little wonder why the Durasteel Duke always survives.
The Rists are a family of assassins who ascended into nobility through centuries of murder and sabotage. Duke Corwin is beyond our reach.
I'm gonna pay House Rist a visit, be back once the duke's a corpse.
Excuse me, I have a job to do.
You're determined, I'll give you that.
Does it look like I'm getting cold feet to you?
Quitting isn't an option.
It's your life, hunter, I've apprised you of the risk.
Anybody who can't kill someone face-to-face ain't a concern of mine.
Assassins are chumps.
The last bounty hunter I hired probably thought the same thing.
You'll need to find Duke Corwin's haven inside House Rist and stop whatever negotiations my cousin has underway, permanently.
I'm likely sending you to your death, but if you can manage to succeed, I will have a suitable payment waiting.
Are you absolutely insane? House Alde just announced that mercenaries have pillaged the Royal Museum!
They are calling for whoever is responsible for the attack to be brought up on war crimes. War crimes! I demand an explanation.
I do what has to be done to finish a job.
I was in a hurry.
You'd better hope that the Organas lose this war, or we'll both be facing firing squads.
The duke shouldn't have put the relics in danger in the first place.
Hey, we aren't to blame.
I doubt anyone will see matters that pragmatically.
Keep talking and I'll be penning your will in blood.
You don't make demands of me.
I... I believe I can forgive this error, once.
Let's see if this was worth the backlash. Hmm, this is in Organa's "house tongue." I'll need a moment to parse the details.
Your attack on House Alde certainly didn't go unnoticed, but you managed not to cause any unnecessary destruction. That merits a bonus, I think.
Appreciated, Baron.
I never say no to credits.
You'll be certain to see more if you continue to perform with distinction.
Nice to be appreciated.
Thanks.
Excellence should never go unnoticed.
I ain't your pet, I don't need a treat for not going on the rug.
Don't patronize me.
I... I meant no offense. Keep it or not, your choice.
Let's see what you've discovered. Hmm, this is in Organa's "house tongue." Give me a moment to parse the details.
These houses... Thul vassals, Ulgo vassals, House Organa. Duke Corwin isn't just allying with the Organas, he's organizing an entire coalition against House Thul!
Does that thing say where the duke is or not?
Skip it, I want a location.
It does, but that information is of no further use to us now.
Sounds like he's prepping you guys for a good beat down.
That can't be good.
Indelicate, but accurate, and there is nothing we can do about it.
He won't be organizing squat when I'm done with him.
Not for long.
You'll never have the chance to make good on that threat.
Remember, damaging the Royal Museum could have disastrous consequences.
According to Malfus's information, Duke Corwin is in negotiations with our enemy, House Organa. They're placing messages in phony relics at House Alde's Royal Museum for later retrieval.
Duke Corwin's placed an imposter relic in the museum recently; you'll have to forcibly enter House Alde and find it.
I'll get my gear together and head back out.
On my way.
House Alde has the support of Organa and the Republic. Do not underestimate them.
Can't I just buy a ticket and take the tour?
Why forcibly?
House Alde is a vassal house of Organa. They are at war with us as much as anyone else.
I was thinking my rap sheet's a little light on breaking and entering.
Now that's more my style.
This is not playtime. You're to identify the fraudulent relic and bring me the message.
And use extreme caution. The museum holds priceless cultural treasures. Nobody wants to be responsible for destroying that heritage.
"Priceless" is something Alderaanians only use to describe things they still own. Catch my drift?
Looks like we're getting to sightsee after all.
I'll look forward to hearing of your success.
It is clear that you have plans in motion, nephew--ah, your newest lackey.
Tell me, did my nephew mention that he already hired a bounty hunter... and got him promptly killed?
Past business dealings aren't my interest. Getting paid for this one is.
Not interested. Working.
I recall Veeboo saying something similar... before you killed him. It's never a bad idea to show interest in your competition.
What's he talking about, Zacar?
That true?
You're already aware of Duke Corwin's reputation for survival.
Just saves me the trouble of taking him off the payroll.
More credits for me, then.
Think that was the you-know-who, here for the you-know-what?
That could have been our competition. Might've caught a lucky break.
If you would please excuse yourself, uncle, I have business with my advocate.
I see how your brat Raffid learned to disgrace us. Advocate... pah.
I just got a very impolite communication from Lord Malfus saying that you assaulted him. Is that true?
I convinced him it'd be a bad idea to hold out on me.
Yes.
You know, I'm beginning to appreciate your particular brand of diplomacy.
I may have negotiated with his face a little.
Could be.
I've always thought that pompous nitwit could use a good straightening out.
I should have fed him my blaster.
He got off lucky.
Don't get carried away. We were fortunate that your roughhousing didn't cost us the prize.
You're back without incident. I'm surprised Lord Malfus didn't raise a stir. Insufferable man.
This is everything he gave me.
Here's the data.
I don't let chumps get me riled.
He tried. I wasn't having it.
You performed admirably.
Don't ask me to do anything like that again.
I'm not doing anymore deals.
Come now, try not to act as if my credits are bad.
Don't keep Malfus waiting; this may be difficult enough as it is.
I'm a bounty hunter. I'm after the Durasteel Duke. Can you help or not?
Right to the point, yes? I'm afraid the duke and his sister left House Girard some time ago under... unpleasant circumstances.
House Girard now has a vested interest in finding the duke and having him meet an unpleasant end.
A minor noble claims to have a lead on the duke. However, he insists on meeting in person--which I'm not willing to do. Instead, I will employ you.
Formalities aren't in my job description.
I'm not a diplomat.
You're expecting a double-cross?
You want a bodyguard, right?
It's possible. Either way, I'm certainly not going out in that war zone, and none of my relatives can be trusted.
Just tell me where to find this twerp.
I'll teach him some respect.
This transaction must be handled delicately.
I can't expect you to navigate the intricacies of our society, but I can give you the authority to negotiate on my behalf.
From this point on, you will act as House Girard's advocate. A role of honor. Come, I will walk you through the appointment ceremony.
After you.
Just set up this deal. The duke's not getting any deader.
Let's not and say we did.
You have a point. Let us move with haste.
Just make it quick.
This is not to be taken lightly, bounty hunter. I am bestowing immense legal authority, even if it is temporary.
Please kneel. I, Baron Zacar Girard, do hereby bequeath my voice and my seal to this proxy.
Now repeat after me: I humbly accept this honor and swear to carry my authority in a manner befitting the lord I serve.
I humbly accept this honor and swear to carry my authority in a manner befitting the lord I serve.
Okay.
You may rise. Well done, there may be hope for you yet.
Uh-huh. I accept... you know the rest. So, we done?
Yeah, honor and all that.
What--no. You must... nevermind.
You have anything else to say or can I get back to shooting people?
Quit wasting my time.
Already, I question putting my faith in you--but my options are limited.
It is customary for information to be double-encrypted in these transactions, so Lord Malfus must enter his half of the key before you take the data.
I'll let Malfus know you'll arrive at his encampment soon. Be on your best behavior.
